title: Is there a way to lock a Pixel 4 screen while watching a video to prevent accidental screen taps?
content: Is there a way to temporarily lock your pixel 4 screen, so that, when watching a video, you don't accidentally tap the screen and it switch apps or stop the video? I want to be able to let my kid watch a video on my phone, but he always accidentally hits things and messes up the video/app.
